title: .toISOString()
description: The `.toISOString()` JS method returns a string in simplified extended ISO 8601 format from a `Date` object, representing the date and time in UTC.
content: The method that returns a string representing the date and time in ISO 8601 format: '2024-08-19T12:34:56.789Z'. It provides a standardized way to represent dates and times in UTC, without considering the local time zone.
